description.raw: There are a few places in gazebo that use tinyxml symbols `TiXmlDocument` and `TiXmlElement` without including `tinyxml.h`. It still compiles because `tinyxml.h` is included in some sdformat header files (parser.hh and Converter.hh). Since only pointers are used those sdf files, the classes can be forward-declared instead of including `tinyxml.h`, which is the change proposed in [sdformat pull request 263](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/263). This pull request is necessary for gazebo to compile with that sdformat branch.
